website_summaries.verdict: A soft and durable set of sheets with hotel-quality comfort.
pros: Thick, tightly woven sheets get softer every time you wash them
Available in a wide range of colors
Deep pockets keep your fitted sheet locked in place
cons: May be too heavy for those who sweat at night

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Sheets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets were very poor. We tried washing them in the hope that this might solve the problem. Sadly, the pilling got even worse. The pilling was so bad that they were scratchy when you laid on it --- like sandpaper!. We just missed the return period, so now I guess we just have to throw them away. We would not recommend purchasing these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Gallishopper

customer_reviews.title: Soft until they get pills
customer_reviews.text: We did a lot of research to find a high quality sheet set at a reasonable price. This brand was recommended by my parents so we ordered them without hesitation. They were extremely soft and comfortable the first few nights. However, little pills started forming on the fitted sheet after just a week. I tried washing them again, as instructed. It has been just over a month and now both the fitted and flat sheet have pills all over them and the pillow case is starting pill up as well. I have bought much poorer quality sheets before and they wear thin after about a year, but none have ever gotten pills on them before.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst sheets I ever bought. Material wears into little balls on sheets 1 week after use. Sheets turn prickly like my wife’s legs after not shaving for 4 days. Terrible. Ordered new sheets today to replace this garbage. I won’t even give these sheets to my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are truly fan-effing-tastic
customer_reviews.text: Received today on time, washed dryer and threw on the bed. It's like we got a new mattress. Seriously these are thick soft sheets. A few more washings and I can tell they are gonna be dope. I am super pumped about these sheets. You should buy them. These sheets made our bed feel like a new bed. like when you go to a really nice hotel and the sheets have structure and you cant feel the mattress ridges and you sleep so awesome. Best sheets I have ever had. buying a second set now because I never don't want to have these.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty DOO

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Edit: bumping up my star rating from a 1 to a 3 for their customer service. They’ve actually been great to work with. I’m going to keep the sheets, wash a few more times and see if that helps soften them up. Dang!! After reading so many great reviews I really was excited to get my sheets. Well...maybe I should have paid more attention to the 1 star reviews, because these sheets are SO scratchy and rough! I seriously believe that anyone who stated in their review must have received different sheets than I did. Mine were awful. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Duncan

customer_reviews.title: After one wash, no longer fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought the California King sheets and I originally loved them. I am very particular about on what and where I sleep. After washing them once, they no longer fit my bed. I have to keep tugging and pulling at them to barely fit...very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Knitra1980

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit well on cal king pillow top mattresses
customer_reviews.text: I do really love the way these sheets are made BUT I had to give it 3 stars because I have a California king pillow top mattress and I literally have to fight with the fitted sheet to get it on. It has never been easy, and unfortunately after I washed and dried them it was noticeably more difficult. I didn’t bother returning them, I probably should have but I’ll keep fighting until time for a new set.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reel

customer_reviews.title: Sheets feel great, hopefully the fitted sheet will stay put on my dep mattress
customer_reviews.text: They feel like quality sheets. So far they have stayed on my deep mattress. This is the main reason I purchased these after reading positive reviews. I have had many so-called deep fitted sheets that do not stay on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: They are as beautifully advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product is just as advertised!!! Sheets are a passion. I will be changing out my sheets with several of the many colors available. i have to be sure to remember the brand
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Watkins

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: best sheets I have ever bought. soft, smooth, durable, wonderful wide elastic edge plus extra corner elastic for tight fit. similar quality sheets are $140.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: We ordered CAL King sheet set in ivory. But the bottom sheet does not fit our CAL King mattress. We washed these sheets cold after receiving them per the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe Le Peu

customer_reviews.title: one Perfect set; problem resolved expeditiously and fairly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 Chateau Home Collection 100% Egyptian cotton 800 Thread Count Cal King Sheet set. One set in Burgundy and the other in Ivory - the burgundy set is perfect. The ivory set was washed three times and had significant pilling of the fabric. Brought the issue to the company and they completely resolved it appropriately within 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jack E Bird

customer_reviews.title: slightly crisp but very soft and very cool to the touch all night long
customer_reviews.text: SO worth every penny. Gorgeous texture and weight...slightly crisp but very soft and very cool to the touch all night long. Feels exactly like the best high-end resort or hotel bedding. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: These sheets were great when they arrived. I washed them once and we slept on them for less then a month and they started to pill. Returning them. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Have had these sheets for a few days. Absolutely love how comfortable they are, initial wash came out great. Cant speak for the durability yet except to say they feel and laundered like a top quality product. I am extremely pleased and hope to enjoy these sheets for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Luxurious feel. Seems to be good quality so far. The cheaper color was a lot less ugly than I thought it would be too!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit!
customer_reviews.text: This sheet set did not fit my California king bed! The corners in the fitted sheet stick up and the top sheet has about a 1/2 inch on each side and is not long enough to tuck in at the end of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sheets !
customer_reviews.text: The Chateau Home customer care woman was very helpful in working out a very late delivery. The white sheet set was out of stock but as we waited ,we never knew that......thanks again for your help !. The sheets themselves ( we got Ivory instead) were really wonderful.....soft, very well made, definitely worth the price. Fit our Cal. King bed perfectly. I would highly recommend these sheets and the Chateau Home company.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: European cotton sheets??
customer_reviews.text: The sheets pilled immediately and continued to deteriorate. Would never recommend this product. Can't believe that they would pass a quality test.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Weston

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sheets
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. After reading previous reviews, I washed the sheets twice before using them. They were great and I can tell that within a few weeks, they will be fantastic. Would definitely recommend buying these!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: After first couple washes the sheets started to pill up, small bumps all over, and are annoying when laying on. Not very high quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Pennino

customer_reviews.title: Shrank
customer_reviews.text: Shrank no longer fit. Also too thick. Shopping for sheets again.
customer_reviews.author: D Loughran

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. Unfortunately the fitted sheet has lost about an inch in length in two washing cycles making it difficult to tuck.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent sheets that fit our 18 inch deep mattress well
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent sheets that fit our 18 inch deep mattress well. They are thick and luxurious with great attention to detail obvious in their quality. I am planning to buy sets for our guests enjoyment as well.
customer_reviews.author: raymond f hafer

customer_reviews.title: Did not Wash Well
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunetly my sheets now have balls all over them and are very rough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and love the texture. I prefer the 800 count over the 1000 count sateen.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Material is comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The fitted and flat sheets are very comfortable and they are for my own use. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: AY

customer_reviews.title: ... sheets - washed them and they seem to be good quality - will keep posted as to how they ...
customer_reviews.text: Just rec'd sheets - washed them and they seem to be good quality - will keep posted as to how they wear.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy sheets
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy sheets. If I have any negative comment it is that they do wrinkle somewhat and I refuse to iron sheets anymore, but I still love them.
customer_reviews.author: N Carter

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are thick...but not soft at all. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Azmon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and service!
customer_reviews.text: Quick devlivery, package intact, sheets great quality. I am very happy with product and service, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: James F. Charles

customer_reviews.title: After 2 month of sleeping on these I'm buying another set! LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sheets! These are quality, durable and soooo comfortable. When they first arrived I was concerned as they are thick, so I thought they might be hot while sleeping on them, but absolutely not. They are crisp feeling and stay that way all week until I change them out. They do wrinkle a bit but smooth right out when put on the bed. They fix snug to the mattress so they stay on perfectly. Today I ordered another set and cant wait to get them so when i do my weekly sheet change I will have another set to use.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 100% cotton sheets
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful sheets! The quality is high, and although I DO need to take them out of the dryer promptly, they really don't wrinkle very much, probably because the fabric has great body. The bottom sheet has elastic all the way around and it stays put--which was my reason for buying new sheets. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AmyD

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are awesome! Keep in mind you will need to wash them about 3-4 times for them to be just perfectly silky and soft. This is a great price for this quality. Especially for me needing California king size. We are very happy with this purchase and will buy again for the guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Family

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sheet set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sheet set for the price. I wasn’t expecting the fabric to be so thick though. i’m used to thinner, softer sheets but my husband loves them and the price was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised. Well packaged. Washed up well. Satisfied with purchase. Visually product appears adequate. Heaviest sheets i’ve Ever slept under(and over). Comfortable. As for durability, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: WI Doorbell

customer_reviews.title: Best sheets that I have ever slept in
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are exactly as advertised.Best sheets that I have ever slept in. I ordered Cal-King as they fit preciseely. The comfort level is a new experience. Pre wash before using and you are in for a wonderful nights sleep. And they will wear for a long time. The cloth is so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: lewneytoon

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made and even though I bought CA King size they do not fit two TwinXL mattresses on a reclining bed.
customer_reviews.author: FTW Guy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sheets. They are comfortable and crisp. They were delivered exactly as promised.
customer_reviews.author: G B.

customer_reviews.title: Pills terribly!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets pilled almost immediately. They are rendered useless to me. I threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dana

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. What I do like is the color and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. What I do like is the color and how soft they are.
customer_reviews.author: JEWELS

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought two sets!
customer_reviews.text: These are - by far - the nicest sheets we have ever slept on!
customer_reviews.author: Jean L.

customer_reviews.title: Cool and crisp sheets
customer_reviews.text: Buying sheets online can be very confusing since you aren't able to feel the material. I took a chance and bought these sheets and absolutely love them. The other sheets I own are microfiber sheets and yes they are very soft but they are also very warm in the summer. These sheets are cool and crisp when you slip into bed, and never make your body too hot. The material is thick so I think they will outlast many other sheets. They washed nicely and still feel like new.
customer_reviews.author: L. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets. One of the finest quality we have ordered via Woot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CHATEAU HOME COLLECTION 4-Piece Sheet Set 16 inch Deep Pockets (fits Upto 18" mattresses) 800 Thread Count 100% Egyptian Cotton Solid Sateen Weave Hotel Luxury Soft Comfort Bedding (Calking, Ivory)
feature_bullets: Imported from Ethically Certified Factory in India
FOR MATCHING EXTRA PILLOWCASE PAIRS SEARCH: B07BQQLPG9

LUXURIOUSLY THICK AND BREATHABLE HOTEL BEDDING COLLECTION SHEETS. These exquisite sheets are thick & heavy and have that luxurious hotel feel that only comes with the high thread count fabric crafted from the finest 100% Egyptian cotton yarns. The sheets are closely woven, keeping your comfort in mind and gets softer with each wash. OUR USP -100% Cotton Sheets. We specialize in manufacturing the softest and most luxurious cotton sheets in the industry including our best seller Egyptian sheets

PREMIUM EGYPTIAN COTTON BEDDING FOR HIGHEST QUALITY BEST COTTON SHEETS New & Improved Version: If you love the feel of luxurious hotel sheets and crisp pillowcases, you will fall in love with our 100% Egyptian cotton 800 thread count sheets. We use fine yarns made with long staple cotton fiber using a silky soft sateen weave. Our sheets get softer with each wash, lifetime softness, resist fading, and are incredibly eco-friendly. Premium Best Quality cotton yarns ensure utmost comfort sheets.

CLASSIC TAILORED LOOK WITH DEEP POCKETS: California King Size Luxury 4-Piece Bed Sheets Set - Flat sheet & pillowcases come with a tailored marrow stitch for a hotel bedding collection look. Each set includes 1 Flat Sheet, 108" x 102"; 1 Fully Elasticized Fitted Sheet, 78" x 84" with deep pockets generously sized to fit mattresses upto 18"; and 2 King Pillowcases, 20" x 40". Our Deep Pocket fitted sheet feature Smart Head/ Foot Tag to indicate the width side of the fitted sheet for ease of use.

BEST QUALITY CERTIFIED STANDARD 100 BY OEKO-TEX - Your new 800 count sheets are tested thoroughly to ensure the utmost safety and comfort. Every inch of our fabric meets top performance standards for pilling, shrinkage, color fastness, strength, and thread count. Extensive product inspection checks and ongoing factory audits ensure sustainability. Each piece of fabric is measured individually and each linen is stitched to perfection. We inspect each piece individually to ensure it is flawless.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – An Exquisite 800 thread count sheet set crafted from the finest Egyptian cotton yarns. .Our products are backed by incredible customer service. We are dedicated to ensuring you have an excellent experience, from the moment you place your order until you sleep on your new bedding the first time. ORDER NOW, risk-free. Our designs match any décor and are a wonderful gift idea for men and women, Moms and Dads, Valentine's, Mother's Day, Father's Day, and Christmas.
